name: Frog on the Log
description:
FROG ON THE LOG

For Personal Computers & Mobile Devices

Frog on the Log is a simple game where you control a little frog and must jump up and catch flies until you get bored with it. This game was made very quickly as a secret in another project but I thought I would upload it standalone as a demonstration for my #2600Jam. 

There is no overall goal in this game, it just goes on forever. It's just a simple little time waster. No deaths, no failure and no overall objective.

Controls

Arrow Keys to Move

Z to Jump

A to Ribbit

R to Reset

Works on Mobile!

For the first time ever I have actually got one of my games working on mobile, just tap the game screen and the controls will appear on screen.
